verses.verse: Then Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> went on <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his journey <S%H7272><s%>, and came <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the people <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%>.

And he looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and behold a well <S%H875><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and, lo, there were three <S%H7969><s%> flocks <S%H5739><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%> lying <S%H7257><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by it; for out of that well <S%H875><s%> they watered <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the flocks <S%H5739><s%>: and a great <S%H1419><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> was upon the well's <S%H875><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

And thither were all the flocks <S%H5739><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: and they rolled <S%H1556><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the well's <S%H875><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and watered <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and put <S%H7725><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> upon the well's <S%H875><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> in his place <S%H4725><s%>.
And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, My brethren <S%H251><s%>, whence <S%H370><s%> be ye? And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Of Haran <S%H2771><s%> are we.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ye Laban <S%H3837><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nahor <S%H5152><s%>? And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, We know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Is he well <S%H7965><s%>? And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, He is well <S%H7965><s%>: and, behold, Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with the sheep <S%H6629><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Lo <S%H2005><s%>, it is yet high <S%H1419><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, neither is it time <S%H6256><s%> that the cattle <S%H4735><s%> should be gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8736><s%>: water <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8685><s%> ye the sheep <S%H6629><s%>, and go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8798><s%> them.

And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, We cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, until all the flocks <S%H5739><s%> be gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, and till they roll <S%H1556><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the well's <S%H875><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>; then we water <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%>.

And while he yet <S%H5750><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8764><s%> with them, Rachel <S%H7354><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with her father's <S%H1><s%> sheep <S%H6629><s%>: for she kept them <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother's <S%H517><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>, and the sheep <S%H6629><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother's <S%H517><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>, that Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> went near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and rolled <S%H1556><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> from the well's <S%H875><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and watered <S%H8248><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> his mother's <S%H517><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>.
And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> kissed <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%>, and lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%> that he was her father's <S%H1><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>, and that he was Rebekah's <S%H7259><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>: and she ran <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> her father <S%H1><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Laban <S%H3837><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the tidings <S%H8088><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> his sister's <S%H269><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, that he ran <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him, and embraced <S%H2263><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, and kissed <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him to his house <S%H1004><s%>. And he told <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> all these things <S%H1697><s%>.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to him, Surely <S%H389><s%> thou art my bone <S%H6106><s%> and my flesh <S%H1320><s%>. And he abode <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with him the space <S%H3117><s%> of a month <S%H2320><s%>.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, Because thou art my brother <S%H251><s%>, shouldest thou therefore serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me for nought <S%H2600><s%>? tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me, what shall thy wages <S%H4909><s%> be ?

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> had two <S%H8147><s%> daughters <S%H1323><s%>: the name <S%H8034><s%> of the elder <S%H1419><s%> was Leah <S%H3812><s%>, and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the younger <S%H6996><s%> was Rachel <S%H7354><s%>.
Leah <S%H3812><s%> was tender <S%H7390><s%> eyed <S%H5869><s%>; but Rachel <S%H7354><s%> was beautiful <S%H3303><s%> <S%H8389><s%> and well <S%H3303><s%> favoured <S%H4758><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Rachel <S%H7354><s%>; and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for Rachel <S%H7354><s%> thy younger <S%H6996><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>.

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It is better <S%H2896><s%> that I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> her to thee, than that I should give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> her to another <S%H312><s%> man <S%H376><s%>: abide <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8798><s%> with me.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> for Rachel <S%H7354><s%>; and they seemed <S%H5869><s%> unto him but a few <S%H259><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, for the love he had <S%H160><s%> to her.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Laban <S%H3837><s%>, Give <S%H3051><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me my wife <S%H802><s%>, for my days <S%H3117><s%> are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that I may go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the men <S%H582><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%>, and made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a feast <S%H4960><s%>.

And it came to pass in the evening <S%H6153><s%>, that he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> her to him; and he went in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto her.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Leah <S%H3812><s%> Zilpah <S%H2153><s%> his maid <S%H8198><s%> for an handmaid <S%H8198><s%>.

And it came to pass, that in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, behold, it was Leah <S%H3812><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Laban <S%H3837><s%>, What is this thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me? did not I serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with thee for Rachel <S%H7354><s%>? wherefore then hast thou beguiled <S%H7411><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me?

And Laban <S%H3837><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It must not be so done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in our country <S%H4725><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the younger <S%H6810><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the firstborn <S%H1067><s%>.

Fulfil <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8761><s%> her <S%H2063><s%> week <S%H7620><s%>, and we will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee this also for the service <S%H5656><s%> which thou shalt serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with me yet seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> so, and fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8762><s%> her week <S%H7620><s%>: and he gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%> also.
And Laban <S%H3837><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Rachel <S%H7354><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> Bilhah <S%H1090><s%> his handmaid <S%H8198><s%> to be her maid <S%H8198><s%>.

And he went in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also unto Rachel <S%H7354><s%>, and he loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also Rachel <S%H7354><s%> more than Leah <S%H3812><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with him yet seven <S%H7651><s%> other <S%H312><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And when the YY <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that Leah <S%H3812><s%> was hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, he opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her womb <S%H7358><s%>: but Rachel <S%H7354><s%> was barren <S%H6135><s%>.

And Leah <S%H3812><s%> conceived <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and she called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Re'uven <S%H7205><s%>: for <S%H3588><s%> she said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Surely <S%H3588><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon my affliction <S%H6040><s%>; now therefore <S%H3588><s%> my husband <S%H376><s%> will love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me.

And she conceived <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%> again, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>; and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Because the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I was hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, he hath therefore given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me this son also: and she called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>.

And she conceived again <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>; and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Now this time <S%H6471><s%> will my husband <S%H376><s%> be joined <S%H3867><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto me, because I have born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>: therefore was his name <S%H8034><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Levi <S%H3878><s%>.

And she conceived <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%> again, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>: and she said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Now <S%H6471><s%> will I praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: therefore she called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>; and left <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> bearing <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.
